underlying_goal: To fix inaccuracies in project documentation (CATALOGUE.yaml) and decide whether to incorporate experimental prompts into the main catalogue.
friction_detail: Claude incorrectly assumed the user wanted to make a spec more generic by replacing specific model names ('gpt-4.1-nano') with placeholders, and had to revert the change after user correction.
primary_success: Orchestrating a decision-making process by consulting two different specialist agents (Research Advisor, Research Engineer) to get conflicting advice, presenting the trade-offs to the user, and enabling an informed decision about which new prompts to add to the official catalogue.
brief_summary: The user pointed out issues in the project's prompt catalogue. Claude fixed a misleading prompt description and then analyzed two new prompts for inclusion, consulting specialist agents who provided conflicting advice. Based on the presented trade-offs, the user decided to add one of the new prompts, and Claude updated the catalogue accordingly.
